      • createExecutionHandler

        protected org.jboss.netty.handler.execution.ExecutionHandler createExecutionHandler(int size)

      • setUseExecutionHandler

        public void setUseExecutionHandler(boolean useHandler,
                          int size)
        Set true if an ExecutionHandler should be used to hand over the tasks. This should be done if you have some ProtocolHandler's which need to full fill some blocking operation.
        Parameters:
        useHandler - true if an ExecutionHandler should be used
        size - the thread count to use
